TEXT.TITLE: PROPOSED OFFERINGS RECENTLY FILED WITH THE SEC
TEXT.BODY: The following proposed securities offerings were filed recently with the Securities and Exchange Commission: Essex Chemical Corp <ESX> - Offering of 60 mln dlrs of convertible subordinated debentures due 2012 through Thomsom McKinnon Securities Inc and PaineWebber Inc. International Game Technology <IGAM> - Offering of 35 mln dlrs of senior notes due 1995 and 25 mln dlrs of convertible senior subordinated deberntures due 2002 through Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc. Reuter
